description: '''Moses Sumney''' (born May 19, 1992) is an American singer-songwriter and actor. His self-recorded EP, ''Mid-City Island'', was released in 2014. He released another five-song EP in 2016, titled ''Lamentations''. His first full-length album, ''[[Aromanticism (album)|Aromanticism]]'', was released in September 2017. His second studio album, ''[[Gr√¶]]'', was released in 2020. Sumney has performed as an opening act for [[James Blake (musician)|James Blake]], [[Solange Knowles]], and [[Sufjan Stevens]]. In 2023, he was featured on [[The Weeknd]]'s [[HBO]] TV series ''[[The Idol (TV series)|The Idol]]''.
